## Instructions

Please answer each of the following with a short essay, replacing the "your answer here" with your answer, including any chunks needed to support it.

### 1. Climate Change

The rain in Spain falls mainly ...

#### Answer to 1. {.studentanswer}

Global climate change, IMHO, means that Spanish rain will fall elsewhere. But maybe there's a third place that will be sending rain to Spain. Or will it be submerged, like Florida. Some arithmetic might help:

```{r}
sqrt(1:10)
```


### 2. Political correctness

The adjective "HUUUGE" is correctly applied to which kind of objects.

#### Answer to 2. {.studentanswer}

Walls and hands.
